root: ^While ghost facial expressions are almost entirely uninterpretable, you feel as though you might be able to make out a smile.

g-1: ^Well everyone looks just about the same when they're a ghost, don't they? But somehow...
g-2: ^Somehow, I just know I know who that ghost over there is. I've known them since we were kids...
^I'm glad I'm here with them when this happened.

replay: ^While ghost facial expressions are almost entirely uninterpretable, you feel as though you might be able to make out a smile.
